## NoMetadataSelectorComponent class

Plugin component for metadata selector, which does not allows selection of metadata

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NoMetadataSelectorComponent<TMetadata> implements NoMetadataSelector<TMetadata>, GridPluginGeneric<NoMetadataSelectorOptions>, OnDestroy 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(pluginElement)](./grid.nometadataselectorcomponent._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>NoMetadataSelectorComponent</code> class |

|  [metadataChange](./grid.nometadataselectorcomponent.metadatachange.md) |  | <code>EventEmitter&lt;void&gt;</code> | Occurs when metadata changed |
|  [metadataGatherer](./grid.nometadataselectorcomponent.metadatagatherer.md) |  | <code>MetadataGatherer&lt;TMetadata&gt;</code> | Instance of metadata gatherer, which is used for getting initial metadata |
